title.narrative: UNDP Zimbabwe National Human Development Report 2016
UNDP Zimbabwe National Human Development Report 2016

description.narrative: Stöd till UNDP Zimbabwe Human Development Report 2016: Rapporten redogör för de framsteg mot utveckling som åstadkommits i landet, exempelvis ökade möjligheter som utbildning, vård och dugliga levnadsförhållanden. Rapporten kommer även att inkludera ämnen som klimatförändringar samt mänsklig utveckling. Syftet med rapporten är att a) informera och påverka nationella policys angående klimatmitigering och adaptering från ett mänskligt perspektiv b) rapporten används för att mobilisera resurser för initiativ inom klimatadaptering och mitigering samt bygga resiliens hos utsatta grupper c) underlätta integreringen av policys angående klimatförändringar och miljö i den bredare utvecklingsagendan för inkluderande tillväxt och hållbar utveckling.

Support to UNDP Zimbabwe Human Development Report 2016: This is a report that tracks the country's development progress as indicated by increased choices and freedoms to live long and healthy life, to be educated and enjoy decent standard of living. The 2016 Report will also look at climate change and human development. Its objectives are a) inform and influence national policies for climate mitigation and adaptation using human lens b) use the report as a tool for resource mobilization for climate mitigation and adaption initiatives, as well as building the resilience of the vulnerable people c) help integrate climate change and environment policies into broader development with a focus on inclusive growth and sustainable development

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: The results achieved include: 1. Production of the Zimbabwe Human Development Report 2017 - Climate Change and Human Development: Towards Building a Climate Resilient Nation. 2. Multiple stakeholder Engagements. 3. Launch of the Human Development Report and Showcasing of Sweden's Support to the Production of the Report. 4. Panel Discussion on the Report, with Major Donors, the World Bank and Government taking part. Event attended by Government Departments and Civil Society. 5. Youth Event to Showcase the Findings of the Human Development Report.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
